title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 ยง 4209.5 - Identification of horses
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 ยง 4209.5 - Identification of horses

State Regulations

No horse shall be permitted to race which has not been
registered and tattooed in a manner approved by the commission. Before each
start such horse's tattoo number shall be read and verified. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9
ยง
4209.5

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
